snippet: Chris Kirk survived a wild back nine to win the McGladrey Classic on St. Simons Island, Ga., with help from a big mistake by Briny Baird.
abstract: Chris Kirk wins McGladrey Classic on St Simons Island, Ga; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Kirk survived a wild back nine to win the McGladrey Classic on St. Simons Island, Ga., with help from a big mistake by Briny Baird.

headline.main: Kirk Takes Win at McGladrey Classic
